root.name: The King of Fighters '94 Re-bout
root.description: Released in time for the tenth anniversary of the series, King of Fighters 94 Re-bout features classic and enhanced game modes for this first entry into SNK's venerable fighting franchise.A western version, exclusive to the Xbox, was in developed and even advertised in manuals of other SNK games, but ultimately unreleased.

similar_games.game: Tatsunoko vs. Capcom: Ultimate All Stars
